sentences.english: She withered him with a scornful look .
sentences.chinese: 她輕蔑的一瞥使他感到羞慚。

sentences.english: Then, humiliated , you will have to take the least important place.
sentences.chinese: 你就羞羞慚慚的退到末位上去了。

sentences.english: Then, humiliated, you will have to take the least important place.
sentences.chinese: 你就羞羞慚慚地退到末位上去了。

sentences.english: Men going home glance at me and smile and fill me with shame.
sentences.chinese: 回家的人們瞅着我，微笑着，令我滿心羞慚。

sentences.english: With both easily I will awning my naked shame.
sentences.chinese: 我將用雙手掩起我赤裸的羞慚。

sentences.english: I must admit to feeling ashamed of my conduct.
sentences.chinese: 我患上認可因自己的舉動而感想羞慚。

sentences.english: For I am shamed by that which I bring forth.
sentences.chinese: 因爲我可憐的作品使我羞慚。

sentences.english: Praise shames me- for I secretly plead with for it.
sentences.chinese: 榮譽使我感到羞慚，由於我暗地裏求着它。

sentences.english: With both hands I will cover my naked shame.
sentences.chinese: 我將用雙手掩起我赤裸的羞慚。

definition: embroidered headband used as decoration by actors or in Hui ethnic group/to reward an actor with brocade headband
to have bright eyes and white teeth
to parade oneself ostentatiously about town (idiom)
to make up/elaborately made up woman
homosexual/see 斷袖之癖|断袖之癖[duan4 xiu4 zhi1 pi3]
to hate and resent/angry and full of grievances
to feel hatred/to harbor a grudge
see 楊貴妃|杨贵妃[Yang2 Gui4 fei1]
properly/satisfactorily/firmly/very fitting/appropriate/proper/to be in good order/also written 妥帖
